owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Salvador González Gerpe
owl:Ontology.dc:description: Digital Twin ontology used to define Digital Twins and Semantic Digital Twins and aggregations by dimensions using Web of Things.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: WoTDT: The WoT Digital Twin Ontology with Aggregation extension.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes de action of aggregation between two different entities or dtw:DigitalTwinAggregate.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: aggregate d tw a

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes de action of aggregation between two different entities or dtw:DigitalTwinInstance.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: aggregate d tw i

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: td:InteractionAffordance uses dtw:Model to model something.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: apply model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes the different interaction affordances that the dt:DigitalTwinServices contains.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains interaction affordance

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes the different connections of the dtw:DigitalTwin.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has connection

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes if the connection point is the consumer of the information.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has consumer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes the different data that the dt:DigitalTwinData contains.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has data

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes the different Digital Entities that the digital twin contains.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has digital entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes the Entity that the digital twin describes.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes the different extension formats that the models or data can be found.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has format

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes the different models that the dtw:DigitalEntity contains.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that describes if the connection point is the provider of the information.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has provider

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: td:InteractionAffordance uses dcat:Resource for a reason.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: use data to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: dcat:Resource used by td:InteractionAffordance for a reason.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: used to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: dtw:Model used by td:InteractionAffordance to model something.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: used to model

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Extension of the model or data with which can be found.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has extension

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Boolean that indicates if the concept is inside or outside the digital twin.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is internal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the behaviors and response mechanisms of the entity (e.g. state transition, performance and disturbances)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Behavioral Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Existing connection between different dtw:ConnectionPoint.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Connection point of the connection.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Connection between dcat:Resource and td:InteractionAffordance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Service Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This dimension of the digital twin consists of various data models that represents all the information allocated in the digital twin.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Digital Entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A realistic representation of all product life cycle components using physical, virtual and interaction data.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Digital Twin

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the aggregation of all the DTIs. Unlike the DTI, the DTA may not be an independent data structure. It may be a computing construct that has access to all DTIs and queries them either ad-hoc or proactively.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Digital Twin Aggregate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Dimensions of which the digital twin is composed.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Digital Twin Dimension

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes a specific corresponding physical product that an individual Digital Twin remains linked to throughout the life of that physical product.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Digital Twin Instance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This dimension of the digital twin consists of various subsystems, objects and sensory devices. These subsystems can include dynamic systems, control systems, maintenance systems, etc., and can be combined for a specific task. Also, non physical entities can be represented.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Connection point of the connection that is external to the DTw.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: External Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extension format in which the model or data is available.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Format

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes all the geometric parameters of the physical entity (e.g. shapes, sizes and assembly relations).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geometric Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Connection point of the connection that is internal to the DTw.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Internal Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Model that allows the alignment of data with the objective of obtaining harmonised data from non-harmonised data.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Mapping Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Representation or conceptualization of the data registered in the Virtual Entity dimension.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Connection between dtw:Model and dcat:Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Model Data Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Connection between dtw:Model and td:InteractionAffordance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Model Service Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Model that contains the conceptualization of the information of the digital twin. This conceptualization activity refers to the organization and structuration of the information (data, knowledge, etc.), obtained during the acquisition process, into meaningful models at the knowledge level and according to the ontology requirements specification document.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ontology Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Responsible for providing all the physical properties (e.g. speed and force) based on dt:GeometricModel
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Physical Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A set of rules extracted from the historical data obtained from the physical model, whose function is to provide the virtual entity with a judgment for decision making, optimization, evaluation, prediction and maintenance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rules Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Model that contains the data validation rules allowing the data to be validated.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Shapes Model
